==== New Scout Project Wizard
:doctype: article
:revnumber: {project-version}
include::_initDoc.adoc[]

//fallback for safe mode == secure:
ifndef::imgsdir[:imgsdir: ../../../../imgs]
ifndef::codedir[:codedir: ../../../../../code]
ifndef::mdledir[:mdledir: ../../../../adoc]
:experimental:

The _New Scout Project_ wizard can be used to create a new Scout project.
To open it, select the menu:File[New,Project...] Menu and type "`Scout Project`" in the wizard search field.

image::{imgsdir}/sdk_new_project.png[]

Group Id:: Maven groupId used for all created projects.
Artifact Id:: Maven artifactId for the parent project. The additional projects are derived from this name (If you select `myapp` you will get several other projects `myapp.client`, `myapp.shared`, ...)
Display Name:: The name of the application presented to the user (e.g. in the Browser title bar).

With the [element]_Project Location_ group box, you can control where the project will be created.
Unchecked the [element]_Use default Workspace location_ checkbox to enter an other value in the [element]_Target Directory_ Field.
The btn:[Browse...] button can help you to find the appropriate path.

See also the <<tutorial_helloworld.adoc#,Hello world Tutorial>> for a complete project creation example.
